001package fr.univavignon.pokedex.api;
002
003public class PokemonFactory implements IPokemonFactory {
004
005    /**
006     * Creates a pokemon instance computing it IVs.
007     *
008     * @param index Pokemon index.
009     * @param cp Pokemon CP.
010     * @param hp Pokemon HP.
011     * @param dust Required dust for upgrading pokemon.
012     * @param candy Required candy for upgrading pokemon.
013     * @return Created pokemon instance.
014     */
015    @Override
016    public Pokemon createPokemon(final int index, final int cp, final int hp, final int dust, final int candy) {
017        PokemonMetadataProvider pokemonMetadataProvider = new PokemonMetadataProvider();
018        PokemonMetadata pokemonMetadata = pokemonMetadataProvider.getPokemonMetadata(index);
019        int iv;
020        final int const1 = 56;
021        final int const2 = 100;
022        iv = (index == 0) ? const1 : const2;
023        return new Pokemon(index, pokemonMetadata.getName(), pokemonMetadata.getAttack(), pokemonMetadata.getDefense(), pokemonMetadata.getStamina(), cp, hp, dust, candy, iv);
024    }
025}
026
